section.title: Database Server Firewall Requirements
section.para: Red Hat Virtualization supports the use of a remote database server. If you plan to use a remote database server with Red Hat Virtualization then you must ensure that the remote database server allows connections from the Manager.

row.entry: Default port for PostgreSQL database connections.

section.para: If you plan to use a local database server on the Manager itself, which is the default option provided during installation, then no additional firewall rules are required.
